Real-time ML Inference
for Apache Flink

Open-source machine learning inference SDK for streaming applications. Integrate ML models seamlessly into your data pipelines. I will be grateful for your contributions!

Why Otter Streams?

High Performance

Optimized for low-latency inference with efficient resource management and parallel processing

Multi-Framework

Native support for ONNX, TensorFlow, PyTorch, XGBoost, and PMML model formats

Enterprise Features

Built-in monitoring, caching, error handling, and fault tolerance for production deployments

Easy Integration

Simple API that integrates seamlessly with existing Flink applications and workflows

Cloud Native

Support for remote inference endpoints including AWS SageMaker, GCP Vertex AI, and Azure ML

Scalable

Designed to scale horizontally with your Flink cluster for high-throughput workloads

About Otter Streams

Otter Streams is an open-source ML inference library designed specifically for Apache Flink streaming applications. Built with performance and reliability in mind. Contributions are welcome!
